description: Display the main hero section with retro poster aesthetic, featuring the tagline 'Taking Your Business to the Next Level' and company description, with centered logo that moves to header on scroll
steps: Navigate to homepage and verify hero section displays with correct Forest Green background
Confirm tagline appears on right side using CA SMUT font
Verify company description appears on left side using CA SMUT FULL font
Test that logo appears centered and moves to header when scrolling down
Check that all text is properly readable and styled

description: Fixed header navigation with Home, About, Pricing, and Contact Us links, featuring retro design with Forest Green background and small logo on scroll
steps: Verify header displays with Forest Green background and correct styling
Click each navigation item (Home, About, Pricing, Contact) and confirm proper routing
Test that small logo appears in header center when scrolling down from hero
Confirm header remains fixed at top during page scroll
Verify navigation links highlight current page appropriately

description: Services section explaining the 4-step process (Research, Script, Film & Edit, Upload) with custom icons, descriptions, and call-to-action buttons
steps: Navigate to services section and verify Ivory/Cream background displays correctly
Confirm all 4 service steps display with proper icons and descriptions
Verify 'Learn more about what we do' button links to About page
Test 'Learn more about our pricing' button links to Pricing page
Check that section uses CA SMUT and CA SMUT FULL fonts appropriately

description: Interactive FAQ section with 8 expandable questions covering service details, personal branding benefits, camera comfort, time requirements, and agency differentiation
steps: Navigate to FAQ section and verify all 8 questions are displayed collapsed
Click on each FAQ item to expand and verify content displays correctly
Test that clicking an expanded item collapses it again
Verify only one FAQ can be expanded at a time (accordion behavior)
Confirm all FAQ content matches the provided text exactly

description: Footer section with Burgundy background containing social media icons and contact email, maintaining retro aesthetic
steps: Scroll to footer and verify Burgundy background displays correctly
Confirm contact@cinebih.com email is displayed and clickable
Verify all social media icons are present (placeholders for links)
Test that footer styling matches retro poster theme
Check that footer content is properly aligned and readable

description: About page featuring company story, mission, and industry-specific approach explanation with retro styling
steps: Navigate to About page via navigation or service button
Verify 'Our Story' section displays with proper retro styling
Confirm all story content renders correctly with appropriate fonts
Check that page maintains consistent color palette throughout
Verify page is accessible from multiple navigation points

description: Detailed breakdown of Research, Script, Film & Edit, and Upload services with explanations of methodology and benefits
steps: Navigate to detailed services section on About page
Verify each service (Research, Script, Film & Edit, Upload) has detailed explanation
Confirm 'Book Now' button is present and properly styled
Check that content formatting matches the reference image style
Verify all service descriptions are complete and accurate

description: Pricing page with service cost explanation, team breakdown, and Starter package details with retro design elements
steps: Navigate to Pricing page and verify retro styling consistency
Confirm pricing explanation section displays team value proposition
Verify Starter package shows all included services and €1950/month price
Test that 'Book Now' button is present and properly styled
Check that page layout matches overall site aesthetic

description: Basic contact form allowing users to submit inquiries with fields for name, email, and message
steps: Navigate to Contact page and verify form displays correctly
Fill out contact form with valid information and submit
Test form validation with invalid/missing information
Verify form submission provides appropriate feedback
Confirm form styling matches retro design theme

description: Mobile-responsive design ensuring all sections, navigation, and content display properly on mobile devices while maintaining retro aesthetic
steps: Access site on mobile device or resize browser to mobile width
Navigate through all pages and verify content remains readable
Test that navigation works properly on mobile (hamburger menu if needed)
Confirm hero section logo and text positioning adapts to mobile
Verify FAQ accordion and all interactive elements work on touch devices

description: Consistent application of the defined color palette across all pages and sections (Forest Green, Cognac Brown, Ivory/Cream, Burgundy, Antique Gold, Rust Orange)
steps: Navigate through all pages and verify Forest Green is used for headers
Confirm Cognac Brown appears in hero background
Check that Ivory/Cream is used for services background
Verify Burgundy appears in footer and call-to-action areas
Confirm Antique Gold is used for headings and accents throughout

description: Proper implementation of CA SMUT and CA SMUT FULL fonts throughout the site according to the specified design requirements
steps: Verify CA SMUT font is used for main headings and taglines
Confirm CA SMUT FULL font is used for body text and descriptions
Check font loading and fallback options work correctly
Test font readability across different screen sizes
Verify font weights and styles are consistent throughout

description: Dynamic logo behavior that shows centered in hero section initially, then moves to header center when user scrolls down
steps: Load homepage and verify logo appears centered in hero section
Scroll down slowly and observe logo transition to header
Verify small logo appears in center of header navigation
Test that logo remains in header during continued scrolling
Confirm logo transition is smooth and visually appealing

description: Seamless navigation between all pages (Home, About, Pricing, Contact) with proper routing and page state management
steps: Navigate from homepage to each other page using header navigation
Test navigation from service section buttons to About and Pricing pages
Verify browser back/forward buttons work correctly
Confirm current page is indicated in navigation
Test that all internal links function properly

description: All call-to-action buttons (Learn More, Book Now) properly styled with Rust Orange background and correct routing functionality
steps: Locate all CTA buttons throughout the site
Verify buttons use Rust Orange background color
Test that 'Learn More' buttons route to appropriate pages
Confirm 'Book Now' buttons are present and properly styled
Check button hover states and interactive feedback

description: Custom service icons for Research, Script, Film & Edit, and Upload sections display correctly with proper alignment and styling
steps: Navigate to services section and verify all 4 icons are visible
Confirm icons match the provided designs for each service
Check that icons are properly aligned with their respective text
Verify icons maintain quality at different screen sizes
Test that icons enhance the overall visual hierarchy

description: Appropriate loading states and transitions when navigating between pages to maintain smooth user experience
steps: Navigate between pages and observe loading behavior
Verify smooth transitions without jarring content shifts
Test page loading on slower connections
Confirm all assets (fonts, images, icons) load properly
Check that loading states maintain retro design consistency

description: 404 error page and other error states styled consistently with retro theme and providing helpful navigation back to main content
steps: Navigate to non-existent URL to trigger 404 page
Verify 404 page maintains retro styling and branding
Test that error page provides navigation back to homepage
Confirm error page includes contact information if needed
Check that error handling doesn't break site functionality

description: Social media icons in footer prepared for linking to company social profiles, maintaining visual consistency
steps: Locate social media icons in footer section
Verify all major platform icons are included
Confirm icons are properly styled to match retro theme
Test icon hover states and visual feedback
Verify icons are positioned correctly within footer layout

description: All text content maintains proper contrast ratios and readability across different backgrounds while preserving retro aesthetic
steps: Review text on Forest Green backgrounds for readability
Check text contrast on Cognac Brown hero section
Verify readability of content on Ivory/Cream backgrounds
Test text visibility on Burgundy footer background
Confirm all text meets accessibility contrast requirements

description: All FAQ content displays exactly as specified, including statistics, examples, and detailed explanations about services and personal branding
steps: Review each FAQ answer for accuracy against provided content
Verify statistics (4.26 billion users, 54% research products, etc.) display correctly
Confirm personal branding examples (Gary Vaynerchuk, MrBeast, etc.) are included
Check that all FAQ responses are complete and properly formatted
Test that FAQ content maintains consistent tone and messaging

description: Starter package details clearly displayed with all included services, pricing, and bonus items in an attractive, retro-styled format
steps: Navigate to pricing section and locate Starter package
Verify all 9 included services are listed correctly
Confirm €1950/month pricing is prominently displayed
Check that bonus item (Optimize Your Profile Checklist) is included
Test that package presentation is visually appealing and clear

description: About page story section properly formatted with emphasis on key points, industry-specific approach, and company mission
steps: Navigate to About page story section
Verify story content flows logically and is well-formatted
Check that key points about industry-specific content are emphasized
Confirm company mission and values are clearly communicated
Test that story section maintains reader engagement throughout

description: Detailed explanation of each service methodology (Research, Script, Film & Edit, Upload) with time investments and benefits clearly communicated
steps: Review Research section explanation about 10-15 hours investment
Verify Script section explains monthly planning and consistency benefits
Check Film & Edit section covers cost-effectiveness and phone filming
Confirm Upload section explains platform-specific optimization
Test that all methodology explanations are clear and compelling

description: Consistent visual hierarchy throughout all pages using proper heading levels, spacing, and the retro poster aesthetic
steps: Review heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3) across all pages
Verify consistent spacing between sections and elements
Check that visual weight guides user attention appropriately
Confirm retro poster aesthetic is maintained throughout
Test that page layouts feel cohesive and professional

description: Contact email (contact@cinebih.com) prominently displayed in footer and contact page with proper mailto functionality
steps: Locate contact email in footer section
Verify email appears on contact page as well
Test mailto link functionality when clicking email
Confirm email is properly formatted and readable
Check that contact information is easily discoverable

description: Consistent brand presentation throughout site including logo usage, color application, and messaging tone matching content creation agency positioning
steps: Review logo usage and placement across all pages
Verify brand colors are applied consistently throughout
Check that messaging tone remains professional yet approachable
Confirm brand positioning as content creation agency is clear
Test that overall brand experience feels cohesive

description: Site loads efficiently with optimized images, fonts, and assets while maintaining visual quality of retro design elements
steps: Test page load times across different connection speeds
Verify images and icons load without quality degradation
Check that custom fonts load properly without layout shifts
Confirm site remains responsive during asset loading
Test that performance doesn't compromise visual design quality

description: Site functions properly across major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) with consistent retro styling and functionality
steps: Test site functionality in Chrome browser
Verify proper display and function in Firefox
Check Safari compatibility for fonts and styling
Test Edge browser for layout and interactive elements
Confirm consistent user experience across all browsers
